original_title: 唾液が混じり合う 密室接吻社長室 三宮つばき
overview: Tsubaki left her work three years ago to accompany her husband in his business ventures. She left her boss Ozawa, who had a big crush on her, weeping for her.  However, the husband’s company fails, and she returns to ask for her old job back.  Ozawa agrees to help and buy back his company and debts but has a couple of conditions. One, he will hire Tsubaki as secretary. And second, she will be his mistress.
title: Secretly kissing in the president’s office
